Sen. Jones, along with @SenCortezMasto, @SenKamalaHarris & @SenWarren, led a letter this week to 100+ key stakeholders nationwide to solicit feedback that can help improve federal policies for student borrowers of color. Read more about this effort here:  https://sen.gov/5VYZ
